mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(no, title, name, password, content) VALUES(board_no_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{name}, #{password}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT no, title, name, regdate, readcount FROM board ORDER BY no DESC
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT no, title, name, regdate, readcount FROM board ORDER BY no DESC) A) B WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
